attributes.action: amend the acts relating to Hunting
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Myself and several other people that I know do not understand why Hunting with Bows (archery) is illegal while hunting with Guns is legal, We would like to see the acts of law relating to Hunting changed so that Archers who wish to hunt with their bows should be able to do so, either on their own land or with the land owners permission, even if they do have to apply for a licence to do so and prove membership of a national archery society or organisation.
